parameters.definition: Profit yield per dollar invested in condos
Profit yield per dollar invested in detached houses
Minimum percentage of total investment that must be in condos

description: Mrs. Watson wants to invest in the real-estate market and has a total budget of at most \param{TotalBudget}. She has two choices which include condos and detached houses. Each dollar invested in condos yields a \param{ProfitCondo} profit and each dollar invested in detached houses yields a \param{ProfitHouse} profit. A minimum of \param{MinPercentCondo} of all money invested must be in condos, and at least \param{MinInvestHouse} must be in detached houses. Formulate an LP that can be used to maximize total profit earned from Mrs. Watson's investment.
